```{r}
source('myoptim.r')

fn=function(x) {   ## Rosenbrock Banana function
    x1 <- x[1]
    x2 <- x[2]
    100 * (x2 - x1 * x1)^2 + (1 - x1)^2
}

myoptim(c(-1.2,1,3), fn, method=c('Nelder-Mead','checkzeros'), trace=1 )
```
